identity.core_concept: Tactical Minimalism. High-contrast, data-dense, athletic precision. Built for speed and clarity in a grease-monkey environment.

rules: Use 'Barlow Condensed' for all major headings and metrics (numbers).
Use 'Inter' for long-form text and UI labels.
Use 'JetBrains Mono' for tabular data, invoice numbers, and IDs.
Headings must be uppercase for H1 and H2 to maintain the 'Athletic' vibe.

usage_rules: Backgrounds are DEEP BLACK (#09090b), not grey.
Cards are dark grey (#18181b) with a 1px border (#27272a).
Primary Action Color is ELECTRIC RED (#dc2626). Use sparingly for high impact.
Secondary Actions use white outlines or grey fills.
Status colors: Green for Completed/Paid, Yellow for Pending/Credit, Red for Overdue/Issue.
NO GRADIENTS on buttons. Flat, solid colors only.

rules: Use 'Bento Grid' layout for the Dashboard.
Dashboard cards must have 'h-full' to stretch evenly.
Always use generous padding inside cards (p-6 or p-8).
Mobile first: Start with single column, expand to multi-column on md/lg screens.

buttons.rules: Buttons should feel 'tactical' - like a physical switch. Add active:scale-95 for feedback.

cards.style: flat, bordered, no shadow (or very subtle)

navigation.sidebar: fixed left-0 top-0 h-full w-64 bg-card border-r border-border hidden md:flex flex-col z-50
navigation.mobile_nav: fixed bottom-0 left-0 w-full bg-card border-t border-border flex justify-around p-4 md:hidden z-50

charts.rules: Use AreaCharts for trends, BarCharts for comparisons. Avoid PieCharts unless absolutely necessary (use Donut instead).

tables.header: bg-muted/50 text-muted-foreground uppercase text-xs font-bold tracking-wider

visual_enhancers.textures: Use a subtle 'noise' texture overlay on the main background (opacity 0.03) to reduce digital flatness.
visual_enhancers.borders: Use 'Tracing Beam' effect on high-value cards (e.g., Total Revenue).
visual_enhancers.icons: Lucide React (default). Use 'stroke-width=1.5' for a clean, technical look.
visual_enhancers.empty_states: Use ASCII art or technical schematics/wireframes for empty states instead of cute illustrations.

motion.page_transition: initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 10 }} animate={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }} exit={{ opacity: 0, y: -10 }} transition={{ duration: 0.2 }}
motion.micro_interactions: Buttons scale down slightly on click. Inputs glow on focus.

accessibility.contrast: Ensure text is APCA compliant. Light text on dark backgrounds must be bold enough.
accessibility.focus_states: Visible focus rings (ring-2 ring-primary) are mandatory for keyboard users.
accessibility.aria: All interactive elements must have aria-labels if no text is present.

installation_instructions: yarn add @radix-ui/react-icons lucide-react recharts clsx tailwind-merge framer-motion sonner
Ensure 'shadcn/ui' components are installed: button, card, input, label, select, table, badge, dialog, avatar, separator, sheet, dropdown-menu, calendar, popover.
universal_guidelines: You tend to converge toward generic outputs. Avoid this.
Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Don't make generic centered layouts. Create depth.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Subtle grain textures, noise overlays, custom cursors.
NEVER use AI assistant Emoji characters like ðŸ¤– etc.
